Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.
Brawl.display_target_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Incendiary_Grenade.display_help: You are taking additional Damage over Time from the fire of the Incendiary Grenade.
Incendiary_Grenade.display_target_help: You are taking additional Damage over Time from the fire of the Incendiary Grenade.

Throwing_Knives.display_help: With your natural origin you have to rely on your cunning and skill. You've acquired these throwing knives as part of your personal arsenal. You can throw these knives at a very short range, and deal minor Lethal damage to your target, but a nasty wound will do additional Damage over Time. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Fast
Throwing_Knives.display_target_help: You are taking additional Damage over Time from the wound left by the Throwing Knife.

Punch.display_help: A decent punch that has a small chance to Disorient foes.

Kick.display_help: A modest kicking attack that has a small chance to knock opponents down.

Demoralized.display_help: Still demoralized, Ajax hits like a kitten with a head cold.
Demoralized.display_target_help: Still demoralized, Ajax hits like a kitten with a head cold.

Resistance.display_help: You are naturally resistant to smashing and lethal damage.
Resistance.display_target_help: You are naturally resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

Power_Blast.display_help: You launch a more powerful blast of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back.
Power_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Power_Bolt.display_help: You rapidly hurl a bolt of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked down.
Power_Bolt.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Power_Burst.display_help: You launch a very powerful burst of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back.
Power_Burst.display_short_help: Ranged (Close), High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Explosive_Blast.display_help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, causing all foes in caught in the blast to suffer energy and smashing damage. There is also a chance that affected foes will be knocked back.
Explosive_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Cybernetic_Blade.display_help: You slash your target with a cybernetic arm, causing lethal damage.

Energy_Torrent.display_help: You unleash a powerful cone of energy in the direction of an enemy target. This energy blast causes smashing and energy damage to affected targets. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked back.
Energy_Torrent.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Superior DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Bone_Smasher.display_help: You crush a single target with an energy infused overhead punch, causing smashing and energy damage. There is also a chance your target may be stunned.
Bone_Smasher.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing/Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Total_Focus.display_help: You strike a single target with an exceptionally powerful burst of energy. This causes the target and all those nearby to suffer smashing and energy damage. Affected targets are also stunned and may be taunted, preventing them from taking action against anyone but you.
Total_Focus.display_short_help: Melee (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy/Smashing), Stun (Foe), Chance to Taunt (Foe)
Total_Focus.display_target_help: You have been stunned and you may be taunted.

Spectral_Wounds.display_help: The target is made to believe that they are suffering from real, bleeding wounds, but the effects are initially only in their mind. Only at the end are the wounds made real in a burst of lethal damage.
Spectral_Wounds.display_target_help: You are suffering from wounds that exist only in your mind.

Telekinetic_Blast.display_help: You fire a burst of energy from your mind with such force that it can knock enemies back.

Psionic_Dart.display_help: This basic attack does minor Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed, but has a very fast attack rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Psionic_Dart.display_target_help: The Psionic Dart has slowed your Attack rate.

Mind_Probe.display_help: Grip the minds of your foe with a Mind Probe. You must be in close proximity to pull off this attack that wrecks havoc on your foes synapses, dealing moderate Psionic Damage while reducing their attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mind_Probe.display_target_help: The Mind Probe has slowed your Attack rate.

Psionic_Lightning.display_help: You cause a bolt of psionic energy to strike your foe, dealing heavy damage. These bolts also have a chance to drain the enemy's endurance.
Psionic_Lightning.display_target_help: You are taking damage over time and are losing endurance.

Drain_Psyche.display_help: You Drain the Psyche of you nearby foes, thus weakening their Hit Point Regeneration and Endurance Recovery and boosting your own. Recharge: Very Long

Ring_of_Fire.display_help: You immobilize your foe in a ring of fire, causing fire damage over time. Affected targets cannot move and are unable to fly. Recharge: Fast
Ring_of_Fire.display_target_help: You are suffering fire damage over time and are immobilized.

Char.display_help: You surround your target with charred soot and ash, choking them. This momentarily incapacitates them, holding them in place. The target also suffers fire damage over time due to the smoldering debris. Recharge: Moderate
Char.display_target_help: You are suffering fire damage over time and are held.

Cinders.display_help: You create a whirling field of cinders around yourself, causing nearby targets to choke. This causes all affected targets to become incapacitated and held in place. Recharge: Slow

Bonfire.display_help: You can create a bonfire at the feet of a distant target. This causes any foes who try to pass through it to suffer fire damage and be knocked back. Recharge: Slow

Fire_Imps.display_help: You create 3 small Imps out of pure flame. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only possess the most basic instincts and cannot be controlled. Recharge: Slow

Power_Bolt.display_help: You rapidly hurl a bolt of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked down. Recharge: Fast
Power_Bolt.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Power_Blast.display_help: You launch a more powerful blast of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back. Recharge: Fast
Power_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Power_Burst.display_help: You launch a very powerful burst of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back. Recharge: Slow
Power_Burst.display_short_help: Ranged (Close), Extreme DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Assault_Strike.display_help: You deliver a pair of lightning fast blows to your opponent in an effort to throw them off balance, causing smashing damage. This attack can also bruise your target, reducing their defenses.

Heavy_Blow.display_help: You strike your target with a powerful punch, causing smashing damage. This punch is powerful enough that it can knock a target down.
Heavy_Blow.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)

Throwing_Knives.display_help: You throw a sharpened dagger at your target.

Agile_Cross.display_help: You execute a sweeping right hook that can strike multiple targets in your frontal arc. This attack will cause smashing damage. The force of the attack causes trauma, which causes minor lethal damage and reduced regeneration and recovery rates.
Agile_Cross.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG (Smashing), Minor DoT (Lethal), Chance for -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe)
Agile_Cross.display_target_help: You are affected by trauma and are suffering internal bleeding. Your regeneration and recovery are reduced.

Concussive_Blow.display_help: You strike the ground with tremendous force, causing a shockwave of energy that blasts foes around you. All targets nearby suffer smashing damage and minor lethal damage, and may also be knocked back. Additionally, some targets will suffer a minor concussion from the attack, reducing their chance to hit, attack speed and damage.
Concussive_Blow.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Lethal), Chance for Stun(Foe), -ToHit(Foe), -Rech(Foe), -DMG(Foe,All)
Concussive_Blow.display_target_help: You are affected by trauma and are suffering internal bleeding. You may also have a slight concussion, reducing your damage, chance to hit and attack speed.

Fearsome_Blow.display_help: You strike your target with a spinning attack that lands two blows in quick succession. The blows cause smashing damage and are forceful enough to occasionally knock your target down. Additionally, there is a chance that the attack may cause your target to be afraid.
Fearsome_Blow.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockdown(Foe), Fear(Foe)

Rallying_Cry.display_help: You strike the ground with tremendous force, causing a shockwave of energy that blasts foes around you. All targets nearby suffer smashing damage and minor lethal damage, and may also be knocked back. Additionally, some targets will suffer a minor concussion from the attack, reducing their chance to hit, attack speed and damage.
Rallying_Cry.display_short_help: PBAoE, Buff(Self and Allies), +DMG(All), +ToHit, +RES(All Status Effects), +Prot(All Status Effects)
Rallying_Cry.display_target_help: You are affected by trauma and are suffering internal bleeding. You may also have a slight concussion, reducing your damage, chance to hit and attack speed.

Shattering_Uppercut.display_help: You strike your target with a powerful uppercut that knocks them into the air. The force of the blow hits for smashing damage and causes trauma for additional lethal damage. The affected target is unable to fly for a short period and suffers reduced defenses. Finally, the target may be confused or stunned after recovering from being knocked into the air.
Shattering_Uppercut.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smashing), Knockup(Foe), -Fly(Foe), -DEF(All,Foe), Chance for Confuse OR Stun(Foe)
Shattering_Uppercut.display_target_help: You are affected by trauma and are suffering internal bleeding. You may also have a slight concussion, causing confusion or disorientation.
Shattering_Uppercut.display_target_short_help: DoT(Lethal), -DEF(All), Chance for Confuse or Stun

Corruption.display_help: You lash our with your whip firing a bolt of hellfire from its tip corrupting your victim's very living essence dealing minor fire damage, minor toxic damage over time as well as reducing their damage resistance for a short time. Damage: Minor Recharge: Very Fast
Corruption.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Minor DoT (Toxic), -Res
Corruption.display_target_help: Corruption continues to deal additional toxic damage over time as well as reducing your target's damage resistance.

Summon_Demonlings.display_help: Call forth up to three demonlings (depending on your level) to do your bidding. The first demonling is adept at manipulating fire, the second blasts your foes with cold attacks and the third is able to wield hellfire to deal fire/toxic damage. You may only have three demonlings under your command at any given time. If you attempt to summon more demonlings, you can only replace those that have been lost in battle. If you already have your maximum allowed amount, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Lash.display_help: You channel unholy energies into your whip and Lash out at your foe dealing high fire damage causing toxic damage over time. Lash has longer range than most melee attacks will reduce the target's damage resistance and also has a chance to knockdown your target. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Lash.display_short_help: Close, High DMG(Fire), Foe -Res, Knockdown, Minor DoT(Toxic)
Lash.display_target_help: Lash is causing damage over time and reducing your damage resistance.

Crack_Whip.display_help: You channel hellfire into your whip and make an impressive sweep causing high fire damage to enemies within a wide cone and also cause some toxic damage over time. Whip Crack has a larger range than most melee cones. Targets that are struck will also have their resistance to damage reduced for a short time, may suffer toxic damage over time and may be knocked down. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Crack_Whip.display_short_help: Short Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Fire), Foe -Res, Knockdown, DoT(Toxic)
Crack_Whip.display_target_help: Crack Whip is causing damage over time and reducing your damage resistance.

Summon_Demons.display_help: Summons forth one to two Demons (depending on your level) to do your bidding. The first demon summoned is cloaked in hellfire and has skin as hard as stone while the second demon manipulates flame. You may only have 2 Demons under your control at any given time. If you attempt to call more Demons, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have your maximum allowed number, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Summon_Demon_Prince.display_help: Summons forth a foul Demon Prince from the deepest reaches of the Abyss. The Demon Prince is mighty among its kind and is a master of cold powers. It serves the conjuror only so that it may wreak havoc upon the material plane. The Demon has some defense versus lethal, smashing, fire and cold attacks. You may only have 1 Demon Prince under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon another Demon Prince the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Twilight_Grasp.display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's chance to hit and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate
Twilight_Grasp.display_target_help: The Twilight Grasp has reduced your chance to hit and Damage potential.

Tar_Patch.display_help: Drops a large patch of viscous Negative Energy which dramatically slows down enemies that run through it and reduces their damage resistance. Affected targets stuck in the Tar Patch cannot jump or fly. Recharge: Slow
Tar_Patch.display_target_help: Your Running speed and damage resistance is reduced by the Tar Patch. You cannot jump or fly away while in the Tar Patch

Darkest_Night.display_help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and chance to hit of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. Recharge: Moderate
Darkest_Night.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Damage potential are reduced by the darkness.
Darkest_Night.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage and chance to hit of {PlayerDest} and all foes nearby.
Darkest_Night.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage and chance to hit with their {PowerName}.

Corruption.display_help: You lash our with your whip firing a bolt of hellfire from its tip corrupting your victim's very living essence dealing minor fire damage, minor toxic damage over time as well as reducing their damage resistance for a short time. Damage: Minor Recharge: Very Fast
Corruption.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Minor DoT (Toxic), -Res
Corruption.display_target_help: Corruption continues to deal additional toxic damage over time as well as reducing your target's damage resistance.

Lash.display_help: You channel unholy energies into your whip and Lash out at your foe dealing high fire damage causing toxic damage over time. Lash has longer range than most melee attacks will reduce the target's damage resistance and also has a chance to knockdown your target. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Lash.display_short_help: Close, High DMG(Fire), Foe -Res, Knockdown, Minor DoT(Toxic)
Lash.display_target_help: Lash is causing damage over time and reducing your damage resistance.

Crack_Whip.display_help: You channel hellfire into your whip and make an impressive sweep causing high fire damage to enemies within a wide cone and also cause some toxic damage over time. Whip Crack has a larger range than most melee cones. Targets that are struck will also have their resistance to damage reduced for a short time, may suffer toxic damage over time and may be knocked down. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Crack_Whip.display_short_help: Short Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Fire), Foe -Res, Knockdown, DoT(Toxic)
Crack_Whip.display_target_help: Crack Whip is causing damage over time and reducing your damage resistance.

Tar_Patch.display_help: Drops a large patch of viscous Negative Energy which dramatically slows down enemies that run through it and reduces their damage resistance. Affected targets stuck in the Tar Patch cannot jump or fly. Recharge: Slow
Tar_Patch.display_target_help: Your Running speed and damage resistance is reduced by the Tar Patch. You cannot jump or fly away while in the Tar Patch

Darkest_Night.display_help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and chance to hit of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. Recharge: Moderate
Darkest_Night.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Damage potential are reduced by the darkness.
Darkest_Night.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage and chance to hit of {PlayerDest} and all foes nearby.
Darkest_Night.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage and chance to hit with their {PowerName}.

Threatening_Aura.display_help: Desdemona's power and command over demons is threatening to the Praetorian forces who are not used to seeing magic wielded so effectively. She is deemed a very significant threat and will be handled as such.
Threatening_Aura.display_target_help: Desdemona's power and command over demons is threatening to the Praetorian forces who are not used to seeing magic wielded so effectively. She is deemed a very significant threat and will be handled as such.

Ember_Shield.display_help: Desdemona is defending you from Explosive Charges with her Ember Shield.
Ember_Shield.display_target_help: Desdemona is defending you from Explosive Charges with her Ember Shield.

Summon_the_Horde.display_help: Desdemona can call forth a horde of Demons with a single summoning.
Summon_the_Horde.display_target_help: Desdemona can call forth a horde of Demons with a single summoning.

Mark_of_Leadership.display_help: You are being led by someone.
Mark_of_Leadership.display_target_help: Desdemona is currently following you through the Underground.

Electric_Fence.display_help: You surround a single target in an electrical fence, immobilizing them. The target suffers energy damage over time, loses endurance and endures a lowered recovery rate. Some of the drained endurance may be returned to you.
Electric_Fence.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT (Energy), Immobilize (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), -Fly (Foe), Chance for EndGain (Self)
Electric_Fence.display_target_help: You are immobilized and suffer energy damage over time. Additionally, you are losing endurance and suffer recovery.

Tesla_Cage.display_help: You confine your target in an electrical prison, holding them in place. The target suffers energy damage, endurance loss and lowered recovery rate. Some of the drained endurance may be returned to you.
Tesla_Cage.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Energy), Hold (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), Chance for EndGain (Self)
Tesla_Cage.display_target_help: You are held and unable to move. Additionally, you are losing endurance and your recovery rate has been reduced.

Chain_Fences.display_help: You immobilize multiple foes in a chain of electricity, dealing minor energy damage and draining the endurance of affected foes. These foes also suffer from reduced recovery rates.
Chain_Fences.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG (Energy), Immobilize (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), -Fly (Foe)
Chain_Fences.display_target_help: You are immobilized. Additionally, you are losing endurance and suffer a lowered recovery rate.

Jolting_Chain.display_help: You send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, causing muscle spasms and dealing minor damage. Each affected foe is knocked down, and suffers both endurance loss and lowered recovery. This bolt can fork several times, jumping to several opponents rapidly.
Jolting_Chain.display_short_help: Ranged (Chain AoE), Minor DMG(Energy), Knockdown (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe)
Jolting_Chain.display_target_help: You are suffering endurance loss and lowered recovery rate.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: You quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing energy damage and draining some endurance. These bolts may also lower the target's recovery rate. Some of this endurance may transfer back to you.
Charged_Bolts.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), EndDrain (Foe), Chance for -Rec (Foe), EndGain (Self)
Charged_Bolts.display_target_help: You are losing endurance and suffer a reduced recovery rate.

Charged_Brawl.display_help: Your fists become electrically charged and deliver a powerful punch to a single target. This causes energy damage and drains endurance. There is a chance that the target will suffer reduced recovery rate. Additionally, some of the drained endurance may return to you.
Charged_Brawl.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing/Energy), EndDrain (Foe), Chance for -Rec (Foe), EndGain (Self)
Charged_Brawl.display_target_help: You are losing endurance and suffer a reduced recovery rate.

Havok_Punch.display_help: Your fists become electrically charged and deliver a powerful punch to a single target. This causes energy damage and drains endurance. There is a chance that the target will suffer reduced recovery rate and be knocked back. Additionally, some of the drained endurance may return to you.
Havok_Punch.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Smashing/Energy), EndDrain (Foe), Chance for -Rec (Foe), Knockdown (Foe), EndGain (Self)
Havok_Punch.display_target_help: You are losing endurance and suffer a reduced recovery rate.

Thunder_Strike.display_help: You discharge a cone of static electricity that deals energy damage and drains endurance from all affected foes. Additionally, affected foes suffer a reduced recovery rate. Some of the drained endurance may be returned to you.
Thunder_Strike.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG (Energy), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), Chance for EndGain (Self)
Thunder_Strike.display_target_help: You are losing endurance and suffer a reduced recovery rate.

Charge.display_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Chain Jolt. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.
You still carry a charge leftover from the Chain Jolt. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.
You still carry a charge leftover from the Chain Jolt. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

Aqua_Bolt.display_help: You strike your foe with a rapid blast of freezing cold water, causing cold and smashing damage. The target's defenses are also reduced.

Hydro_Blast.display_help: You focus your energy and unleash an intense blast of chilling water at your foe, causing cold and smashing damage. Affected foes will also have their movement speed reduced. There is also a chance that the target will be knocked down.
Hydro_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Cold/Smashing), -Speed (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Hydro_Blast.display_target_help: Your movement speeds have been reduced.

Water_Burst.display_help: You cause water to violently explode from beneath the feet of a single target. The target and all nearby foes are blasted with freezing cold water and suffer cold and smashing damage. Additionally, all affected targets will have their movement speeds reduced and may be knocked down.
Water_Burst.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Superior DMG(Cold/Smashing), -Speed (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Water_Burst.display_target_help: Your movement speeds have been reduced.

Steam_Spray.display_help: You spray scalding hot steam in a cone in front of you, badly burning foes caught within the spray. Affected foes suffer an initial burst of fire damage, as well as fire damage over time, and experience reduced defenses for a short time.
Steam_Spray.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Extreme DMG (Fire), Minor DoT (Fire), -DEF (Foe, All)
Steam_Spray.display_target_help: You are suffering fire damage over time and your defenses have been reduced.

Geyser.display_help: You cause a powerful geyser of scalding hot water to erupt from within the earth, burning your foes and tossing them into the air. Affected targets suffer fire damage and are knocked into the air, while also suffering smashing damage and reduced movement speeds upon falling back to the ground. There is a chance that the fall could also leave affected targets stunned.
Geyser.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Fire/Smashing), -Speed (Foe, All), Knockup (Foe), Chance for Stun (Foe)
Geyser.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced and you may be stunned.

Transfusion.display_help: You drain an enemy of some endurance and lower their regeneration. The energy drained is transferred to you and your allies, healing them.

Siphon_Power.display_help: You manipulate life energy to drain power from a targeted foe, reducing their damage potential. This drained power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies.
Siphon_Power.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.
Siphon_Power.display_attacker_hit: You reduced the damage potential of {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} to increase your own!
Siphon_Power.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage potential with {PowerName} to increase their own!

Fulcrum_Shift.display_help: You drain the power of a targeted foe and all foes near the target, transferring this drained power to yourself and all nearby allies. Affected foes suffer reduced damage potential, while affected allies gain improved damage potential. The amount of the damage potential bonus increases in proportion to the number of targets affected by the power drain.
Fulcrum_Shift.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.

Incinerate.display_help: You are being Incinerated. It burns!
Incinerate.display_target_help: You are being Incinerated. It burns!

Freezing_Touch.display_help: FrostFire has Held you frozen in a block of Ice.
Freezing_Touch.display_target_help: FrostFire has Held you frozen in a block of Ice.

Ice_Blast.display_help: FrostFire's Ice Blast has chilled you, slowing your attack and movement speeds.
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: FrostFire's Ice Blast has chilled you, slowing your attack and movement speeds.

Freeze_Ray.display_help: FrostFire has Held you frozen in a block of Ice.
Freeze_Ray.display_target_help: FrostFire has Held you frozen in a block of Ice.

Chilblain.display_help: You are Immobilized and taking cold damage over time.
Chilblain.display_target_help: You are Immobilized and taking cold damage over time.

Flashfire.display_help: You are Disoriented and on fire!
Flashfire.display_target_help: You are Disoriented and on fire!

Blazing_Aura.display_help: You are taking fire damage from FrostFire's Blazing Aura.
Blazing_Aura.display_target_help: You are taking fire damage from FrostFire's Blazing Aura.

Chilling_Embrace.display_help: You are slowed from FrostFire's Chilling Embrace.
Chilling_Embrace.display_target_help: You are slowed from FrostFire's Chilling Embrace.

Power_Bolt.display_help: You rapidly hurl a bolt of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked down.
Power_Bolt.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Energy_Torrent.display_help: You unleash a powerful cone of energy in the direction of an enemy target. This energy blast causes smashing and energy damage to affected targets. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked back.
Energy_Torrent.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Superior DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Force_Bolt.display_help: You discharge a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals smashing damage.

Phantasm.display_help: You can construct a powerful entity composed of pure light. Although made of light, the Phantasm is tangible and has powerful Energy attacks. The Phantasm can also fly and summon duplicates of itself. The duplicates are intangible, and cannot be harmed. The duplicates' attacks deal illusory damage similar to that dealt by Spectral Wounds. Only the original Phantasm can be healed and buffed. Recharge: Very Long

Protection_Shield.display_help: You protect an ally from Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time, along with reducing Toxic damage.
Protection_Shield.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic)
Protection_Shield.display_target_help: You have been encased in a Protection Shield. Your Defense to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks is increased, and your ability to resist Toxic attacks is increased as well.
Protection_Shield.display_target_short_help: +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic)

Detention_Field.display_help: You encase a targeted foe in a detention field. The captured target is held and immobilized.
Detention_Field.display_target_help: You have been held and immobilized.

Dispersion_Bubble.display_help: You create a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks except Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.display_target_help: The Dispersion Bubble is increasing your Defenses and providing protection from Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting attacks.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Repulsion_Bomb.display_help: You project an expanding force bubble around a targeted foe, causing smashing damage to that target and its nearby allies. Additionally, affected targets will be both knocked down and stunned.
Repulsion_Bomb.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted Ally AoE), Foe Knockback, Disorient

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack. Rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down.

Energy_Torrent.display_help: You unleash a powerful cone of energy in the direction of an enemy target. This energy blast causes smashing and energy damage to affected targets. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked back.
Energy_Torrent.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Superior DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Resistance.display_help: The Phantasm is resistant to Lethal and Energy damage, but vulnerable to Negative Energy.

Resist_Fire.display_help: Fire Imps take less damage from Fire attacks, can jump quite high, and can travel quickly.

Resistance.display_help: You are naturally resistant to smashing damage.
Resistance.display_target_help: You are naturally resistant to smashing damage.

Barrage.display_help: You perform a pair of quick punches that deal smashing and energy damage. There is a small chance your target will be stunned by these blows.
Barrage.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Energy_Punch.display_help: You channel energy into your fists, unleashing a powerful blow that strikes the target for smashing and energy damage. There is also a small chance the target will be stunned.
Energy_Punch.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Whirling_Hands.display_help: You unleash a powerful roundhouse punch charged with energy, striking multiple nearby targets for smashing and energy damage. There is also a chance that affected targets around you will be stunned.
Whirling_Hands.display_short_help: PBAoE, Superior DMG (Smashing/Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Taunt.display_help: You taunt a targeted foe, potentially drawing the attention of that foe and all those around them. All targets will have their effective range reduced, while some will be able to focus on no other attacker but you.
Taunt.display_target_help: Your effective range has been reduced. You may also be taunted and only able to focus on Pendragon.

Bone_Smasher.display_help: You charge up your fists with energy and then bring them down on the head of a single target. This causes smashing and energy damage. There is also a high chance that the target is stunned.
Bone_Smasher.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG (Smashing/Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Foot_Stomp.display_help: You stomp your foot with tremendous force, shaking the very earth. All nearby foes suffer smashing damage and may be knocked back.
Foot_Stomp.display_short_help: PBAoE, Superior DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)
Foot_Stomp.display_target_help: Hopkins shakes the very Earth itself with a super Foot Stomp, attacking everything in a nearby area.

Cryo_Rifle_MK2.display_help: You are equipped with the latest upgrade of the Crey Industries Cryo Rifle. Like previous models, your target will suffer cold damage and reductions in both movement and attack speeds. However, instead of putting your target to sleep, this rifle will immobilize your target.
Cryo_Rifle_MK2.display_target_help: You are immobilized and suffering from reductions to both your movement and attack speeds.

N2_Discharge.display_help: You release the pressure valves on the liquid nitrogen chambers within your Cryo Rifle, channeling the pressurized liquid nitrogen into a burst that chills multiple targets in an arc in front of you. Affected targets suffer cold damage over time and reductions in both their movement and attack speeds.
N2_Discharge.display_target_help: You have been frozen by Hopkin's N2 Cannon. Your Recharge rate and Movement Speed are reduced.

Nimble_Slash.display_help: A quick swipe with your blades. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. This attack begins both the Empower and Weaken combination attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Power_Slice.display_help: You perform a deadly Strike with your blades. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. This power is needed for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Ablating_Strike.display_help: You slash at your foe with your blades, dealing a good amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This power is needed for the Empower and Weaken combination attacks, and is the beginning of the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Throwing_Knives.display_help: You launch a bladed projectile from your armor, causing minor lethal damage to your target. The knife leaves behind a bleeding wound, which causes additional lethal damage over time.

Kinetic_Shield.display_help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
Kinetic_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(Defense Debuff)
Kinetic_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

Power_Shield.display_help: This Power Shield creates a Electro-Magnetic shield around you that can deflect non-physical attacks. Your Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks is increased as these attacks are reflected or refracted off the shield. Power Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. Recharge: Fast
Power_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Defense Debuff)
Power_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You Power Shield increased you Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks.

Chemical_Ammunition.display_help: You've swapped your ammunition and are now equipped with 'Chemical Rounds.' Most of your Dual Pistol attacks will have their secondary damage converted to toxic damage and inflict a minor damage debuff effect on the target.

Toxic_Pistol.display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic.
Toxic_Pistol.display_target_help: The Toxic blasts have reduced your damage.

Twin_Pistols.display_help: Dual Wield fires both pistols in rapid succession at its desired target. This power is slower than Pistols, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Twin_Pistols.display_target_help: The Toxic blasts have reduced your damage.

Empty_Cells.display_help: You empty the clips of both your pistols in an arc of suppression fire. This attack can blast multiple foes in the affected cone area, and has a small chance of knocking some foes down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Empty_Cells.display_target_help: The Toxic blasts have reduced your damage.

Toxic_Rain.display_help: You fire your pistols faster than the human eye can follow, causing your bullet trajectory to arc, dealing moderate Lethal damage and possibly knocking your foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Toxic_Rain.display_target_help: The Toxic blasts have reduced your damage.

Executioners_Shot.display_help: Executioner's Shot is a deadly close range attack. Foes struck by this attack will suffer lethal damage and will likely be knocked back by the impact of this attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Executioners_Shot.display_target_help: The Toxic blasts have reduced your damage.

Piercing_Rounds.display_help: You fire your pistols with deadly precision in a very narrow cone, piercing your enemy. Piercing Rounds deals High lethal damage and reduces targets' Damage Resistance for a short time. Damage: High Recharge: Long NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from a resistance debuff to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Piercing_Rounds.display_target_help: The Toxic blasts have reduced your damage resistance.

Front_Kick.display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Pistol_Whip.display_help: You can perform a devastating kick that can severely Disorient most opponents. Eagle's Claw has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Martial Arts attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Pistol_Whip.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient, +Special

Cloaking_Device_Low.display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Cloaking_Device_Low.display_target_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

Cloaking_Device.display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Cloaking_Device.display_target_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

Chemical_Ammunition.display_help: You've swapped your ammunition and are now equipped with 'Chemical Rounds.' Most of your Dual Pistol attacks will have their secondary damage converted to toxic damage and inflict a minor damage debuff effect on the target.

Toxic_Pistol.display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic.
Toxic_Pistol.display_target_help: The Toxic blasts have reduced your damage.

Twin_Pistols.display_help: Dual Wield fires both pistols in rapid succession at its desired target. This power is slower than Pistols, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Twin_Pistols.display_target_help: The Toxic blasts have reduced your damage.

Empty_Cells.display_help: You empty the clips of both your pistols in an arc of suppression fire. This attack can blast multiple foes in the affected cone area, and has a small chance of knocking some foes down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Empty_Cells.display_target_help: The Toxic blasts have reduced your damage.

Toxic_Rain.display_help: You fire your pistols faster than the human eye can follow, causing your bullet trajectory to arc, dealing moderate Lethal damage and possibly knocking your foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Toxic_Rain.display_target_help: The Toxic blasts have reduced your damage.

Front_Kick.display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Cloaking_Device_Low.display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Cloaking_Device_Low.display_target_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

Slash.display_help: You perform a quick slash that deals lethal damage and can reduce a target's defense.

Slice.display_help: You slice your opponent for a high amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

Luddite_Armor.display_help: The Luddites do not go into battle completely unprepared. This armor gives them resistance to smashing and lethal damage.

Fire_Blast.display_help: You unleash a blast of fire at your target, causing fire damage and setting them ablaze.

Flash_Stomp.display_help: You stomp the ground around your targets, knocking some back while causing fire damage to all those affected and setting them ablaze.
Flash_Stomp.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Fire), Minor DoT(Fire), Knockback(Foe)

Fire_Breath.display_help: You breath fire on your targets, causing fire damage while setting them ablaze.

Single_Shot.display_help: You fire a single blast from your Beam Rifle, causing energy damage and lowering your target's regeneration. The target will also suffer minor energy damage over time. There is also a chance the target may be knocked down.
Single_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Energy), Minor DoT (Energy), -Regen (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Charged_Shot.display_help: You charge up your beam rifle to launch a concentrated blast of energy at your foe, causing energy damage and lowering recovery. The target will also suffer minor energy damage over time. There is also a chance that your target will be knocked down by the blast.
Charged_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Energy), Minor DoT (Energy), -Rec (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Cutting_Beam.display_help: You fire a steady beam of energy from your beam rifle, sweeping it in a broad arc across the foes in front of you. This causes energy damage to all affected targets, as well as a reduction in defense. There is also a chance that an affected target will suffer additional energy damage over time due to the lingering effects of the energy beam.
Cutting_Beam.display_target_help: Your defenses have been reduced and you may be suffering energy damage over time.

Piercing_Beam.display_help: You fire a supercharged beam of energy in a narrow cone that pierces through up to 3 enemies. Affected targets suffer energy damage and reduced resistance to all types of damage. There is a chance that affected targets will also suffer additional energy damage over time due to the lingering effects of the beam.
Piercing_Beam.display_short_help: Ranged (Narrow Cone), Superior DMG (Energy), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Moderate DoT (Energy)
Piercing_Beam.display_target_help: Your resistance to all forms of damage has been reduced. You may also be suffering energy damage over time.

Overcharge.display_help: You overcharge your beam rifle, releasing the energy in a massive beam at a group of distant foes. Affected targets suffer energy damage, with a small amount of lingering energy damage over time, along with reduction in their defense. There is also a high chance that for an affected target to be stunned.
Overcharge.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy), Minor DoT (Energy), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Stun (Foe)
Overcharge.display_target_help: Your defenses have been reduced and you are suffering energy damage over time. There is also a chance you may be stunned.

Web_Grenade.display_help: You throw a grenade at a single target. On impact, this grenade expels as a strong, sticky gel that can can immobilize most targets and prevent flight. The target will also suffer reductions in their movement and attack speeds.
Web_Grenade.display_target_help: You are immobilized and cannot move or fly. Your movement and attack speeds are also reduced.

Smoke_Grenade.display_help: You throw a grenade at a single target. On impact, this grenade expels as a thick smoke that obscures a small area. This reduces the perception and chance to hit for all targets caught within the area of effect.
Smoke_Grenade.display_target_help: Your perception radius and chance to hit have been reduced.
Smoke_Grenade.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} hits {PlayerDest} slightly reducing their chance to hit and dramatically reducing their perception!
Smoke_Grenade.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with a {PowerName} slightly decreasing your chance to hit and dramatically reducing your perception!

Targeting_Drone.display_help: When this small device is activated, a Targeting Drone will begin to hover around your head and assist your combat performance with laser sights. These sights dramatically improve your chance to hit and increase your perception, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Targeting Drone also grants you resistance to powers that reduce your perception and chance to hit.
Targeting_Drone.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your chance to hit.

Levitate.display_help: You send a single target violently into the air before slamming them to the ground for smashing damage. The target is also rendered unable to fly for a short while.

Dominate.display_help: You painfully tear at the mind of a single foe, causing psionic damage and rendering the target helpless, lost in their own mind and unable to defend themselves.

Confuse.display_help: You invoke confusion in a single target, causing them to be unable to reliably distinguish friend and foe for a short time.

Terrify.display_help: This power Terrifies foes within a cone area in front of you, causing them to tremble in Fear uncontrollably. The affect is so frightening and overwhelming, that the target takes real damage from the physiological response to this Psionic attack. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Psionic_Dart.display_help: You fire a concentrated bolt of psionic energy at your target, causing psionic damage and lowering attack speed.
Psionic_Dart.display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced.

Telekinetic_Thrust.display_help: You unleash a focused attack of intense mental power that violently sends a nearby foe flying. This causes psionic and smashing damage and knocks affected targets back.

Mental_Blast.display_help: You fire a concentrated blast of psionic energy at your target, causing psionic damage and lowering attack speed.
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced.

Subdue.display_help: You mentally manipulate your target's mind, subduing them. This causes psionic damage and may briefly immobilize the target.
Subdue.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Psionic), Chance for Immobilize (Foe)

Dull_Pain.display_help: You activate special programming within your armor that temporarily boosts your maximum hit points.
Dull_Pain.display_target_help: Your maximum hit points have been increased.

Resistance.display_help: You are resistant to smashing, lethal and cold damage, but are vulnerable to energy damage.
Resistance.display_target_help: You are resistant to smashing, lethal and cold damage, but are vulnerable to energy damage.

Sawblade.display_help: You throw sawblades with great force due to your cybernetic enhancements. This sawblade strikes a distant target, causing an initial burst of lethal damage and lethal damage over time. The target also suffers reduced regeneration and recovery. There is also a small chance the target will be knocked back.
Sawblade.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Lethal), Minor DoT (Lethal), -Regen (Foe), -Rec (Foe), Chance for Knockback (Foe)
Sawblade.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time. Additionally, your regeneration and recovery have been reduced.

Cybernetic_Hammers.display_help: You smash a single target with one of your cybernetic hammers. This causes smashing damage and reduces the target's defenses. There is also a chance that the target may be stunned.
Cybernetic_Hammers.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Smashing), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Stun (Foe)
Cybernetic_Hammers.display_target_help: Your defenses have been reduced and you may be stunned.

Hammer_Clap.display_help: You crash both of your cybernetic hammers together with tremendous force, creating a shockwave that causes smashing damage to all foes around you. Affected targets may also be knocked back and stunned.
Hammer_Clap.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Smashing), Chance for Stun (Foe), Knockback (Foe)

Tank_Grenade.display_help: You launch a fragmentation grenade at long range from your armor's backpack. This explodes on impact, throwing shrapnel that causes smashing and lethal damage. There is also a high chance that the concussive effect from the explosion will knock affected targets back.
Tank_Grenade.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Superior DMG (Lethal/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Hack.display_help: You perform a tough slashing attack with your blade, causing lethal damage. This attack will also reduce the defenses of your target and has a chance to land a critical strike, causing additional lethal damage. If hidden, this critical strike chance is guaranteed.
Hack.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Critical DMG (Lethal)

Slash.display_help: You perform a quick slashing attack with your blade, causing lethal damage. This attack will also reduce the target's defenses and has a small chance for a critical strike, causing additional lethal damage. If hidden, this critical strike chance is guaranteed.
Slash.display_short_help: Melee, Minor DMG(Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Critical DMG (Lethal)

Shuriken.display_help: A classic small throwing weapon, you can throw Shurikens at a pretty fast fire rate. You must be level 44 and have Web Grenade or Caltrops before selecting this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Assassins_Blade.display_help: You impale your foe on your blade, causing lethal damage. There is a chance that this attack will be a critical hit, causing additional lethal damage. If hidden, this critical strike chance is guaranteed.
Assassins_Blade.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG (Lethal), Chance for Critical DMG (Lethal)

Placate.display_help: You placate a foe, convincing them to break off their attacks on you. If successful, you will also be hidden from your foes. This stealth effect is very brief and offers no defense bonuses, but it will allow you to set up an attack for a critical strike. If you attack a placated foe, the effect will break, allowing the foe to attack you once more.

Head_Splitter.display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of lethal damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce their Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. If executed while hidden, only some affected targets may be hit with a Critical, however, there is a chance you may land a Critical hit with Golden Dragonfly even if you are not Hidden. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Head_Splitter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG (Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Head_Splitter.display_target_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Hide.display_help: You utilize masterful stealth techniques to become almost impossible to detect. When properly hidden, you can pull off critical hits with your attacks. If you attack or are damaged while hidden, the effect will break and you will be unable to set up guaranteed critical strikes, though you will retain your defense bonuses for a short while.

Dark_Regeneration.display_help: You tap the dark essence of the Netherworld to drain a small amount of life through negative energy damage from all enemies nearby, healing yourself in the process. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed.

Cloak_of_Fear.display_help: You can wrap yourself in a nightmarish Cloak of Fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, with a reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Fast

12_Gauge.display_help: You fire a shot from your 12 Gauge Shotgun, causing lethal damage to several enemies in a cone in front of you. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked down.
12_Gauge.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), High DMG (Lethal), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Slug.display_help: You fire a concentrated slug at a single foe. This causes lethal damage and has a high chance to knock the target down.
Slug.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Lethal), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Frag_Grenade.display_help: You throw a fragmentation grenade at a single target. This explodes on impact, throwing shrapnel that causes smashing and lethal damage. There is also a high chance that the concussive effect from the explosion will knock affected targets back.
Frag_Grenade.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG (Smashing/Lethal), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Jab.display_help: You strike your target with a strong jab. The speed of this attack may catch your opponent off guard, momentarily stunning them.
Jab.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Punch.display_help: You strike your target with a hard punch. Your opponent will suffer smashing damage from the blow and may be knocked back.
Punch.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Haymaker.display_help: You strike your target with a very strong haymaker meant to lay them out. Your opponent will suffer smashing damage from the blow and has a high chance of being knocked back.
Haymaker.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Focused_Shot.display_help: You quickly fire an armor-piercing round from one of your pistols. The target suffers an initial burst of lethal damage and additional lethal damage over time.
Focused_Shot.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

Dual_Shot.display_help: You fire an armor-piercing round from each of your pistols. The target suffers an initial burst of lethal damage and additional lethal damage over time. The target also suffers reduced defenses and may be knocked down.
Dual_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Lethal), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Dual_Shot.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your defenses have been reduced.

Barrage.display_help: You fire armor-piercing rounds in a barrage of rapid fire bullets. These strike multiple targets in a cone in front of you, dealing lethal damage and lowering damage resistances. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked down.
Barrage.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), High DoT (Lethal), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Barrage.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your resistances have been reduced.

Storm_of_Bullets.display_help: You fire numerous bullets at your target so fast that the eye cannot keep up, striking them and all foes around them. This causes a warped bullet trajectory, which causes lethal damage with each hit, as well as an additional chance to knock the target back. The lingering effects of the storm reduce the target's resistances.
Storm_of_Bullets.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Lethal), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Knockback (Foe)
Storm_of_Bullets.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your resistances have been reduced.

Piercing_Rounds.display_help: You take aim and fire a single, powerful armor-piercing round at your target. The target suffers lethal damage, followed by additional lethal damage over time. The bullet rends the target's protections, reducing their defense and resistances.
Piercing_Rounds.display_short_help: Ranged (Narrow Cone), High DMG(Lethal), High DoT(Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), -RES (Foe, All)
Piercing_Rounds.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and both your defenses and resistances have been reduced.

Debilitating_Shot.display_help: You fire a special armor-piercing round at your opponent that erupts into shrapnel on impact. The target suffers lethal damage as a result of this, along with reduced regeneration, recovery and chance to hit. There is also a chance the target may be stunned.
Debilitating_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, Extreme DMG (Lethal), -Regen (Foe), -Rec (Foe), -ToHit (Foe), Chance to Stun (Foe)
Debilitating_Shot.display_target_help: Your regeneration, recovery and chance to hit have been reduced. Additionally, you may be stunned for a short time.

Hurricane_Shot.display_help: You fire many rounds in all directions around yourself, striking all nearby targets with your bullets. This causes lethal damage over time to all affected targets. Additionally, targets suffer from reduced resistances against all types of damage.
Hurricane_Shot.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your resistances have been reduced.

Paralytic_Shot.display_help: You chamber an armor-piercing round at your target that explodes into shrapnel on impact. The force of this round causes paralyzes your opponent, holding them in place while also causing lethal damage. There is a chance that the target will also suffer reduced regeneration and recovery.
Paralytic_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG (Lethal), Hold (Foe), Chance for -Regen (Foe), -Rec (Foe)
Paralytic_Shot.display_target_help: You are held in place and unable to move. Your regeneration and recovery may also be reduced.

Mercurial_Blow.display_help: You strike your foe with a lightning fast blow from your staff dealing Light Smashing damage. The attack is so unexpected that the target's defenses are reduced slightly for a short time. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Light, Recharge: Fast
Mercurial_Blow.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by Mercurial Blow.

Precise_Strike.display_help: You attempt to daze your foe with a heavy staff blow to their head. Precise Strike has a higher chance to hit than normal, deals Moderate Smashing damage, and has a small chance to disorient the target briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast.

Guarded_Spin.display_help: You spin your staff like a propeller in front of you dealing Light Smashing damage to enemies in your frontal arc and deflecting any incoming attacks, thus boosting your Melee and Lethal damage briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Guarded_Spin.display_target_help: Your Guarded Spin has increased your defense moderately.

Serpents_Reach.display_help: You fully extend your staff and release a burst of energy to lash out at a distant target and deal Superior Smashing damage with a good chance to knock your target down. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Long

Focused_Fighting.display_help: You become more evasive to melee attacks while you have Focused Fighting activated. This will increase your Defense versus melee as long as it is active. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and DeBuffs to Defense. Recharge: Fast

Focused_Senses.display_help: You become more evasive against ranged attacks while you have Focused Senses activated. This will increase your Defense versus ranged attacks as long as it is active. Your Improved Senses also allow you to perceive stealthy foes as well as resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast

Mystic_Shot.display_help: This magic attuned rifle shoots concentrated bursts of magical energy, causing energy damage and reducing your target's defenses.

Mystic_Barrage.display_help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's rapid fire barrage attack with the magical training of the Carnival. This deals energy damage and reduces your target's defenses.

Mystic_Smash.display_help: You retain much of your Resistance armor, even as you learn magic from the Carnival. Your armor's energy punch is now powered by mystic energy, causing energy and smashing damage on impact. There is also a chance that you may stun your target.

Mystic_Burst.display_help: Trained by the Carnival mistresses, you have learned how to mimic their Radiance attack, causing energy damage to foes caught in the energy burst and potentially confusing them.

Mystic_Suppression.display_help: You have learned to effectively combine your rifle's suppressive burst fire attack with the magical training of the Carnival, allowing for you to suppress the ability of your foes to attack you. This attack causes energy damage. Affected targets also suffer reductions in their chance to hit and both movement and attack speeds.
Mystic_Suppression.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, as well as your attack and movement speed have been reduced.

Single_Shot.display_help: You are able to switch off the magical attunement of your rifle at will, allowing you to fire a traditional plasma burst that lowers your target's regeneration.

Heavy_Burst.display_help: You switch off the magical attunement of your rifle, allowing you to fire a series of rapid traditional plasma bursts. This causes energy damage to several targets in a cone in front of you and reduces their recovery.

Covering_Fire.display_help: You switch off the magical attunement of your rifle, firing a spray of plasma bursts meant to suppress action by your foes. Affected target suffer energy damage and a reduced chance to hit, due to the amount of energy flying around.
Covering_Fire.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.
